title: In my masjid they pray Taraweeh as 4 rakats, should we pray in the Masjid
transcript: B from Bosnia uh in my area all masjids pray 4x4 and then with like M so is it better if I with a few Brothers leave after is and then we pray or should we pray it with the congregation no it's best for you to go with the brothers and pray according to the Sunnah two by two because this is the instruction of the Prophet Alat wasam praying it for like or this is not permissible
